entry.content:
The legality of slavery of prisoners is literally codified in the thirteenth amendment abolishing slavery, which states:

Section 1. Neither slavery nor involuntary servitude, except as a punishment for crime whereof the party shall have been duly convicted, shall exist within the United States, or any place subject to their jurisdiction.

entry.title: Hitler’s Rise to Power
entry.content: Hitler was not elected in democratically. He only got 36.8% of the vote, and ultimately ascended to power by becoming chancellor.
